welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Middleton, a charming city known for its rich history, picturesque landscapes, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore our city and immerse yourself in its beauty and culture. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Manchester Airport, serving a variety of domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Manchester Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines and charter flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Manchester Airport, mainly used for domestic and European flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a premium option for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport is used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
